Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/20/1987 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Los Angeles on 4/11/1988 (Going to LAD: P Dave Pavlas, C Damon Berryhill, LF Lou Frazier, RF Dave Martinez. Going to CHC: 2B Julio Franco, RF Dave Parker)...
Injured on 6/26/1989 with a Bruised Wrist, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/19/1990 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...

Hit first career homerun on 9/27/1991, off Ron Robinson (CHC)...
